msIdentifier.repository: Washington State Archives, Eastern Regional Branch
msIdentifier.collection: Spokane County Government; Clerk, Territorial Case Files, 1879-1889

div1.p: The United States of America Territory of Washington To E.F. Whittier the Sheriff of Spokane County, Washington: Greeting

This is to command you, that you have the body of Arthur Powell by you imprisoned and detained as it is said before the District Court of the Territory of Washington for the 4th District thereof, holding terms at Cheney in Spokane County on the 5th day of May A.D. 1885 then and there to do and receive what shall be ordered concerning him and have you then and there this writ. Hereof fail not under penalty of the law. By order of the court.
Witness the Hon. George Turner Judge of the 4th Judicial District of the Territory of Washington with the seal of our said court hereunto attached.
Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy

Territory of Washington County of Spokane}ss
I E.F. Whittier Sheriff of Spokane County Washington Territory do hereby certify that the within named prisoner Arthur Powell was in my custody at the time I received the within writ and I on the 5th day of May 1885 in obediance of the command I did bring the said Arthur Powell into the District Court of the Fourth Judicial District holding terms at Cheney said county Washington Territory and have the said Arthur Powell now in court as the within commandment Dated at Cheney this 2nd day of May 1882 E.F. Whittier Sheriff of Spokane County By Jackson Deputy
Returned & filed May 6-85 Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk By R. Strobach Deputy
